bug.short_desc: Vinagre full screen control bar invisible in F24
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
vinagre-3.20.2-2.fc24.x86_64
In full screen mode, vinagre's drop-down control bar is invisible but still present, making it very difficult to use. This is a regression from previous Fedora releases.
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.

I am also experiencing this bug in Fedora 24 with the same version of vinagre. Current work around is when hovering over the invisible bar at the top of the screen, you can either use the meta key to pull up the GNOME activities screen or alt+tab out of vinagre.
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
